DIV1.P: EXTRACTS FROM THE ACCOUNT ROLLS OF THE ABBEY OF DURHAM, FROM THE ORIGINAL MSS.
Published for the Society BY ANDREWS & Co., DURHAM; WHITTAKER & Co., 2, WHITE HART STREET, PATERNOSTER SQUARE; BERNARD QUARITCH, 15, PICCADILLY; BLACKWOOD & SONS, EDINBURGH. 1901.

DIV1.HEAD: ROTULI BURSARIORUM. Continued from Vol. II.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. W. Aslakby, 15 Dec., 1371-16 Apr., 1373.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In 6 ulnis et di. de viridi panno de secta armigerorum, 5 ulnis de stragula emp. apud Derlyngton, 24s. 1d. In Hemmyng de eisdem (pannis lineis pro Napere), 5d. In 4 lb. de Chardeconces, 6s. 8d.
Marescalcia. In 9xx de frostnaill et 1 tuyrne pro sineribus plumbi finandis emp. in villa, 20d.

Exp. nec. In locione 19 petr. 7 lb. cinerum plumbi, petra 2d., 53s. 2d. In 2 celdr. de Charcolle et 1 pari de Belies pro 3 diebus, per diem 18d., pro eisdem cineribus finiand., 12s. 6d. In 1 conger empt. pro d'no Priore, 3s. 4d. In 12 plovers emp. pro eodem, 3s. In ficubus et rasins empt., 6s. 8d. In 26 lb. amigd. emp., prec. lb. 2d. ob., 5s. 5d.

Exp. min. Pro yernyng et Chesecloutes emp. pro vaccaria de Beaurepaire, 2s. 8d. In expen. Will'i Fon cum le barehide d'ni Prioris versus Werkworth, 12d. In pane equino emp. in villa, 16d. In expen. Will'i Fon cum le barehide d'ni Prioris reveniendo de Werkworth, 10d. In emendacione unius Wellynglede in pistrino, 4d. ob. In emendacione Janue Thoralis cum 2 seris emp. de novo pro eadem, 12d. In emendacione unius plumbi erei in bracina, 18d. In emendacione del Milnspindell et reparacione caminorum de thorali, 18d. In exp. cujusdam famuli d'ni Prioris versus Insulam sacram, 12d. In exp. alterius versus Lythum, 3s. 4d.

Repar. domor. In repar. portarum del Spitell de Wytton, 10s. In exp. circa novum scaccarium et lardarium juxta novam coquinam, tam de cementar. operar. quarer. quam aliis minutis exp. factis pro hostiis, fenestr', scapellyng et scaffaldyng pro caminis per tempus comp., 13li. 3d. In 7 fothres plumbi emp. pro coopertura ejusdem scaccarii, prec. fothre 6li. 13s. 4d., 46li. 13s. 4d. In solucione facta Joh'i de Esingwald, plumbario, pro coopertura ejusdem scaccarii cum eodem plumbo, pro
fothre 9s., 63s. In 560 estlandbord emp. apud Novum Castrum pro coopertura ejusdem scaccarii, cum hostiis et fenestr. ad eandem, 104s. 6d. In sol. facta Joh'i de Esyngwald pro exp. suis pro predicto plumbo emend. quinque vicibus, 5s. In exp. factis circa unam domum de novo factam apud Houghall, tam de Cementar. operar. quarer. quam de aliis minutis expen., 12li. 16d. In expen. factis super longam cameram juxta portam Abbathie cum reparacione camere armigerorum, 49s. 7d. ob. In sol. facta plumbar. pro coopertura 2 fothres plumbi super porticum novi scaccarii et capellam Infirmarii et super cameram capelle (sic), 18s.
Contribuciones. (Cardinali; d'no Regi; Ep'o Car∣pentoratanen., etc.). In solucione facta pro le rerdos retro magnum altare pro porcione concernente scaccariam, 17li.
Summa Exp., 1669li. 22d.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. fr. Joh'is de Beryngton, 16 Ap., 1373-28 Maii, 1374.
DIV2.P: Varia Rec. Et de 18li. 3s. 6d. rec. de officiariis tam infra quam extra ad opus del Rerdos magni altaris.
Summa totalis Rec. preter rem. et arr., 2114li. 16s. 2d. ob.
Cum rem. et arr., 3481li. 5s. 8d.

Garderoba. In panno empt. pro le Bursorman, Pro famulo Bursarii, 1374. 7s. In una furura de Calabere empt. pro Mantell. d'ni Prioris, 60s. In 2 lafes de Sugour ponder. 23 lib. quarteron empt. pro expen. d'ni Prioris, 47s. 4d. In Sekklath empt. in villa et in patria, 26s. 4d. In panno lineo empt. apud Welles pro mapparia tam domus refectorii quam Camere Prioris, 107s. In solucione facta pro bots, kaloges empt. pro dicto d'no Priore, 2s. Item quatuor viduis Sce. Marie pro canabo, 4s. In fururacione mantelli Prioris, per Thomam Calas, 12d.

Marescalcia. In duabus securibus empt. in foro per Adam Jolilok, 13d. In canabo empt. pro aqueductu ligand., 3s. In una cera empt. pro batello, 12d. Joh'i Prentys juniori pro reparacione et acuacione secur. et accuacione securium, ponsons, et Chisels cementareorum, 3s. 5d. Will'o Prentys pro diversis rebus de ferro per
ipsum factis in officio Bursarie tempore d'ni Will'i de Aslakby, que non computabantur inter eos, ut dicit, per preceptum d'ni Prentys (sic pro Prioris?), 4li. 3s. 1d. In 600 lednall et Spikyng' empt. de Joh'e Prentis, 3s. 3d. In coopertura et factura unius litere pro d'no Priore portando, cum custagiis sellarum, frenorum, et aliorum apparatuum necessariorum pro eadem, 55s.

Elem. consueta. Pauperibus in die Cene, 102s. 4d. Item pauperibus de domo Dei pro calciamentis, 5s. In pane empto ad distribuend. pro anima d'ni Joh'is de Goldesburgh, 10s. Item in distrib. facta pro animabus d'nor. Joh'is de Cornewayle et Rob'ti de Faceby, 20s.
Summa, 6li. 17s. 4d.

Dona et exhennia d'ni Prioris. Item cuidam nuncio d'ni Regis portanti unam literam d'no Priori pro d'no Uthredo, 3s. 4d. Item duobus Ministrallis cum uno Weyng, 3s. 4d. Item Thome servienti Joh'is Bouer (Boner?) pro labore suo versus Seham pro nativo A neif or unfree dependant of the Abbey, who seems to have run away. nostro capiendo, 2s.

Exp. nec. In sol. facta d'no Thome de Herdwik Elemos. in recompensacione Elemosine de ao lxxijdo, 13s. 4d.; eidem pro dampnis factis in campo del Morehous causa minere carbonum maritimorum, 23s. 6d. Item in expen. Ade Jolilok a Dunelm. usque Oxon. et redeund., 22s. Item in duabus cathenis empt. pro leporariis d'ni Prioris, 3s. 8d. In solucione facta Camerario pro soule-silver servientium suorum de duobus annis, 42s. 11d. Item in sale de Bayon empt. pro Celer. per temp. comp., 4li. Item in exp. Burs. versus Curiam Romanam, ibidem morando, redeundo, et prosequendo negocium ecclesie de Hemyngburgh, See Burton and Raine's "History of Hemingbrough," 59-65. 62li. 9s. Item in exp. ejusdem post adventum suum in Angliam pro eadem, 24li. 4s. Item in pane empto in villa tempore quo comes Marchie pernoctavit apud Dunelm., 10d.

Exp. Min. In uno Rete empto, 16s. 4d. Item in carnibus et pisc. empt. de Celer. et in villa pro diversis operariis comedentibus in parva domo et alibi, et eciam pro hominibus pistrine et bracine per tempus Comp., 22s.
Item mulieribus coligentibus lyng et mos pro stagno molendini per tempus Comp., 12s. Item in 2 libr. de Rosell empt., 8d.

Repar. domor. Item Cementariis, quarerariis, et aliis operariis operantibus super novam coquinam per temp. comp. ut patet per dietas in papiro Bursarii scriptas, 67li. 2s. 8d. Item Rad'o Jowlyn pro 4000 tegulis factis in parco de Mukleswik, 20s. Item Barkar pro factura de flekes in parco de Frankleyn, 12s. Item cuidam mulieri servienti Will'o de Craunswik cooperienti super grangiam de Belasis, 2s. 3d. Cuidam homini querenti Watteles in parco de Raynton pro una domo in Moreslawe, 12d. In 4xx Rigaldes empt., 40s.

Contribuciones. Nuncio d'ni pape, 7s. D'no Regi, 62li. 19s., 30li. 17s. 3d. ob., 19li. 13s. 4d. ob. Vicecom. Ebor., 6li. 7s. 5d. ob.; exp. pro decima solvend., 7s. 2d. Ep'o Carpentren. pro ob. de li. pro porcione Scaccarii, 5s. Summa, 120li. 16s. 3d. ob.
Summa omn. Exp. et Lib., 2345li. 16d. ob.

DIV2.HEAD: 1374. Part of a roll endorsed in an old hand, Burs . . . W. Aslakby, 1370. But it is a duplicate of the following:—
Comp. fr'is Hugonis de Hawyk a festo Pent., 1374, usque f'm Circumcis. D'ni ejusdem anni.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Rem., etc., 1436li. 8s. 11d.
cum Rem., etc., 2266li. 3s. 1d. ob.
Garderoba. In panno empt. pro famulo Bursarii, 4s. 6d. In uno bigirdill empt. pro bursario, 8d. In 15 lib. canobi emp. pro Aqueductu, 17d.
Empcio vini. In empcione unius dolei vini albi et alterius rubei vini preter 11li. 14s. 11d. ob. rec. de vendicione eorundem, 9li. 5s. 6d. ob.
Empcio equorum. In uno equo nigro, 40s., equo bay, 40s., equa grisia, 23s. 4d., equo rubeo, 46s. 8d.

Marescalcia. In feodo Coquine empt. pro carect. et Aqueductu per tempus comp., 8s. 2d.

Exp. Prioris. In 4 pell. empt. de Thoma Calas pro capuc. Prioris, 2s. In expen. d'ni Joh'is Prioris morantis
apud Bieurepair per tempus quo predictus Hugo stetit bursarius usque ad obitum ejusdem d'ni Prioris, ut patet per parcellas a d'no Joh'e de Castrobernardi per vices receptas, 20li. 9d. ob. In uno coreo in quo involvebatur corpus d'ni Joh'is Fossour Prioris, et in solucione facta cuidam Artifici pro labore suo circa eandem involucionem, 5s. See Raine's "St. Cuthbert," 110n., and "Brief Guide," 34. But there is no mention of a sutrix in the Roll, or of any separate charge for the hide. In expen. electi d'ni Rob'i de Walleworth apud Bieurepair ante Natale, ut patet per Indenturas inter bursarium et d'nm Joh'em de Castrobern. factas, 17s. 7d. ob. In uno carcasio bovino et di. emp. de Celer. pro expen. d'ni Joh'is Fossour nuper Prioris, 35s.
Summa, 23li. 5d.
Elem. cons. In distribucione facta pro anima d'ni Joh'is Fossour Prioris, 30s.

Dona et ex. Prioris. In sol. facta 12 ministrallis in festo Sci. Cuthb. ex precepto Prioris, 20s. 8d. In sol. facta Magistro Joh'i de Norton et Hugoni de Fletham venientibus ad eleccionem Prioris, cuilibet 26s. 8d., 53s. 4d. Item 2 famulis dictorum clericorum, cuilibet 3s. 4d., 6s. 8d. Item d'no Joh'i de Neuborn incipienti celebrare missas, 6s. 8d.
Summa, 4li. 7s. 4d.

In sale de Bayon empt. apud Novum Castrum pro priore et Celer. cum cariacione, 56s. 10d. In sale albo empt. de Joh'e fil. Agn., 43s. In una corda empt. ad trahenda ligna ad stangnum molendini, 11d. In sincacione unius putei apud Nethirheworth, et in Instrumentis empt. pro eodem, 46s. 8d. In stangno emp. pro soudur, 6s. ob. In expen. d'ni Roberti de Claxton versus Lond. ad Ep'm Dunelm. pro liter. petend. eligendi Priorem, 106s. 8d. In exp. Stephani del Kiln versus Oxon. cum literis ad citand. confratres ad eleccionem, 8s. 1d. In exp. Ade Cariageman versus Lethom pro eadem causa, 3s. In exp. factis circa adduccionem Magistrorum Joh'is de Norton et Hugonis de Fletham venient. ad eleccionem una cum conduccione equorum pro eisdem, 42s. 4d. Item cuidam occidenti ratones in scaccario et stabulo Bursar., 12d.
Summa omn. Exp., etc., 1010li. 19s. 4d. ob. qar.

Garderoba. In 1 clathset et Barhide empt. pro d'no Priore, 20s.; pro 12 uln. de plunkett empt. In 2 furur. de irislams, 5s. In perfurnisyng capuc' d'ni Prioris ex furura propria, 4s. 6d.

Item d'no Joh'i Gouer Oxon. studenti, ex dono d'ni Prioris, 40s. Item in curialitate facta d'no Joh'i de Acley et sociis suis, et aliis ad exa missis per tempus comp., 13s. 4d.

Cuthb. in Sept., 20s. Item 4 ministrallis d'ni Principis in festo exaltacionis Sce. Crucis, 13s. 4d. Cuidam portanti unam murenam d'no Priori, 6d. Cuidam minis∣trallo in festo Sci. Mathei, 20d. Item cuidam portanti capud unius apri d'no Priori ad Natale, 6d. Item car∣bonariis de Raynton ad potum, 12d. Item ministrallis in festo Sci. Cuthb. in Marcio anno D'ni, etc., lxxvto, 13s. 4d. Item cuidam Haraldo armorum in ultima sept. quadragesime, 13s. 4d. Item duobus ministrallis in die Pasche, 2s.

Exp. nec. In una celdra salis de Patters empt. apud Novum Castr., cum cariacione ejusdem usque Dunelm., 27s. 4d. In 20 quart. salis anni presentis empt. de ten. de Coupon, qr 3s. 4d., 66s. 8d. In exp. factis circa aque ductu carbonum de Raynton, 37li. 7s. 2d. In 136 rod. fosse mundate pro conductu Abbathie, rod. 1d. qa., 16s. 3d. Northumb. pro viridi cera causa destriccionis facte super ten. de Wyllyngton et Walles∣hend, 13s. 4d.

In 2 skeps empt. et 1 hamper pro vasis Argent. d'ni Prioris trussandis, 22d. In filo empt. pro cilicio thoralis et saccis consuendis, 9d. ob. In uno cribro novo empt., cum emendacione de cribris et ridellis et serarum thoralis, 16d. In 300 Ostreis emp. in villa, 2s. 6d. In sol. facta Thome Fox et sociis suis facientibus Erbarium apud Pittyngton, 10s. 10d. In 1 pare de busse empt. pro d'no Priore, 3s. In uno pare de Busse empt. pro officio Burs., 3s. In 2 Coffers et 1 hamper pro vasis argent. d'ni Prioris trussand. lig. per Joh'em Holyn, 5s. 6d. In nattis factis in refectorio per d'nm Will'm de Killerby, 5s.

Repar. domor. In uno thorale calcis combust. pro grangia de Pittyngton, 9s. 4d. In sol. facta quarerariis et aliis Werkmannis frangentibus quareram et operantibus ad stagnum molendini et alibi, 17li. 18s. 9d. ob. In reparacione del Salthous, etc. Mulieribus colligentibus Muscum et hather et operantibus in stagno, 4li. 3s. 7d. In solucione facta Joh'i de Esyngwalde, plumbario, pro coopertura 19 futhers et di. quorum 12 futhers super thorale, 6 futhers super studium d'ni Prioris, 1 futher et di. super capellam Infirmarii, futher pro 9s., 8li. 11s. In factura unius fenestre vitrie nove super locutorium d'ni Prioris, cum reparacione aliarum fenestrar. cum Camera Prioris per Will'm Koky, 7s. 8d. Garderoba. In 6 uln. et di. panni lanei empt. pro Carectariis del Wodcarts, 9s. Uno panno de Worset pro frocco Prioris, etc. 2 uln. et di. de blanket pro duplicacione tunice Prioris, 3s. 11d. 13 uln. de Plonket empt. pro tunicis pro pagettis, 13s. Uno garniamento empt. pro Rogero Pantersman, 4s. In 2 uln. panni viridis empt. pro coopertura scaccarie Burs., 5s. Marescalcia. Pro acuacione 340 secur. cementar. per temp. comp., 3s. 6d. In 2 Tranishone? (or Trauishoue?), ligatur. 1 modii, factura 1 bill pro fagotis, 2s. 4d. In soluc. facta Will'mo Prentys pro 2 Soudyngirns, 1 file, 1 hakhamer, 1 eche, 1 ladell de ferro pro offic. Plumbar., 7s. 6d. In 18 uln. de Hayr pro thorali, uln. 5d.; filo pro eodem per temp. comp. 16d.; in 37 uln. de panno pro saccis uln. 4d.; 1li. fili pro saccis suendis 2d., 21s. 4d.
Dona et ex. Pr. Ep'o Elemos., 3s. 4d. Haraldis, histrionibus, et nunciis, ut patet per cedulam, 30s. 4d. D'no Rogero de Wermouth ad facturam Organorum, 10s.

Exp. nec. In pictura 1 ymaginis Sci. Thome Cantuar., per d'nm Priorem, pro capella de Bieulwe, 20s. In soluc. facta Ric'o Smyth de Heworth pro acuacione del piks carbonar. ibidem per 19 septimanas, 3s. 2d.; operacione 3 petr. ferr. in ligatur. de 2 bukets ibidem, 12d. In 1 corda, 1 barell pro 1 Buket faciend. pro minera de Heworth, empt. apud Novum Castrum, 3s. 3d. In soluc. facta Carbonariis Minere de Heworth per 15 sept., qualibet sept. 6s., Rogero Tomson auxilianti eos pro aqua tractanda per 5 sept., qualibet sept. 18d., et plus in toto 4d., 4li. 17s. 10d. In sol. facta Rad'o Jolibody pro lucracione feni, 12s., eidem pro hernyng 2s., 2 skelles 6d., empt. pro le Nethirdeyhous, 14s. 6d. In exp. factis circa fossat. de le Watergat de Spen' (Spennymoor?) ut patet per papirum Burs., 14li. 6s. 8d. In perforacione 1 fossati in Spen', 14s. 8d.; pro factura meremii pro 1 puteo ibidem, 8s., 15s. 4d. In sinctacione 1 putei in Spen', 4s. 6d. In 2 quar. de Pattowsalt, 7s. 3d. In soluc. facta vicecomiti Northumbr. pro le Grenwax, 13s. 4d.

Exp. min. In lucracione 16 scopularum, 16d. 28 lign. pro Girthes, 12d. 48 fatstanes, 2s. 2d., per Rad'm Jowlyn apud Mugleswyk, 4s. 6d. In 2 scopulis, 3d. In 4 Bols lign., 15d., 12 oll. luteis pro vino, 6d., 12 oll. luteis pro cerevis., 3s. 9d. 30 ciphis albis 3s. 4d. empt. per divers., 9s. 1d. In 1 cribro pendente cum corda pro Thorali, 18d. empt. in villa. In 1 pelle ovina pro ligatur' scaccarii Burs. 1 li. de Kydsape, et paknedils, 8d.; 1 homini custodienti 1 domum in Novo Castro ubi lapides del Rerdos positi fuerunt, 20d. Ric'o fireman bracine pro bonitate, 12d. In 5 paribus caligarum dat. (5 servientibus) ut melius facerent in officiis suis, 6s. 4d.
Repar. domor. Pro coopertura thoralis manerii de Meryngton, 4s. Gilberto Uncouth pro hostiis domus sue in Moreslawe, 2s. 5d. In 600 tyngylnaile empt. pro fenestr. in granario, 12d.
Summa Exp., etc., 1294li. 19s. 4d. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: 1378-9. A headless roll containing payments for '78.

cum arr., etc., 2873li. 14s. ob. di. qa.

Garderoba. Item 15 bedmennis de domo Dei, Werk∣manno del Bakhous, Werkm. del Brouhous, Werkm. Coquine pro pannis suis et canab., cuilibet 4s., 72s.; haire pro thorale; In 30 pell. de Scherlings empt. de Celer. pro pistrina, 5s. Pro 1 pare botarum de Cordwan pro d'no Priore, prec. 3s. 1 pare botarum et Wampas de Dubelsols, 4s.

Marescalcia. In empcione unius paris de belys pro fabro de Joh'e Marschall, 10s. In empcione unius stithi pro fabro de Will'o Prentys, 50s. In soluc. facta Ric'o Bertelmew pro sternacione unius fract' (fraxini) ex dono Alani de Billingham, et factura in diversis necessariis, vz felys, auxiltres, nafes, per unum mensem, 8s. In rosina empt. apud Hertilpoll, 11s.

Expens. Prioris. In soluc. fact. d'no Joh'i de Castro∣bernardi, capellano d'ni Prioris, pro expens. ejusdem in ludis et circuitu per tempus comp. ut patet per Indenturam, 11li. 2s. 6d. In locione alb. et al. vestiment. capelle d'ni Prioris, 6d. In una murena empt. pro d'no Priore in quadragesima, 2s. 6d. (!)

Dona et ex. Prioris. Joh'i Harald, histrionibus, et nunciis d'nor. Regis, Ducis, et aliorum d'nor., 28s. Item seneschallo domus d'ni Ducis ex precepto d'ni Pr., 20s. Item coco d'ni Ducis ex pr. d'ni Pr., 6s. 8d. Garcioni portanti corniculos, 6d.; famulo portanti 3 Wodcoks, 4d.; uni lumbardo, 3s. 4d. Will'o Cotom portanti 1 Goshauk de d'no Joh'e de Lilborn d'no Priori, 12d. Ep'o Elemos., 3s. 4d. Nuncio d'ni Regis, 3s. 4d. Venatori d'ni Regis, 3s. 4d. 2 nunciis d'ni Regis alia vice, 3s. 4d.

Exp. nec. In repar. stangni molendini de Pittington et factura unius trow, 1 ring, et 1 spindell de ferro ibidem, 3s. 6d. In factura unius yetling pro coquina d'ni Prioris cum 30 lib. de brasse, 12s. Item 2 hominibus fugantibus boves, vaccas, equos, de mortuar. parochie de Norham, 12d. In sternacione et colpacione 2 milnepostes, 4s. In cordis emp. pro le Ranet, 37s. 4d., et d'no Joh'i de Herington pro factura unius rite (rete?), 6s. 8d., solut. per manus d'ni Prioris.
Repar. domor. Pro emendacione vie juxta Neuilcros, 12s. 10d.
Summa omn. exp., 1380li. 3s. 3d. ob.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. d'ni Joh'is de Beryngton, Mich., 1379-80. Three slips attached, containing lists of sums deposited with the Bursar, the totals of which appear among the receipts, under the head Mutuaciones. Some recent rolls have had one such slip.
DIV2.P: Summa rec. preter mut., etc., 1803li. 16s. 8d. ob. qa.
Garderoba. In 6 peciis de Carde empt. apud London. pro ridell. d'no Priori faciend., pec. 4s., una cum cordis pro eisdem, 27s.
Marescalcia. In 62 petr. 4 lib. de ferro de Sprois, petr. 9d., 46s. 8d.

Dona et exen. d'ni Prioris. Fratribus mendicantibus de Richemond in recompensacione frumenti quod solebant habere de manerio de Ketton, 2s. Joh'i Vesci et socio suo deferentibus duo signa ab Ep'o d'no Priori de dono ejusdem, 3s. 6d. Will'o Sayuyll, Macer d'ni Regis precept. Pr., 6s. 8d. Magistro Henrico de Hedlam, decano Cestrie, eunti versus Curiam Romanam, de dono d'ni Pr., 20s. In solucione facta d'no Joh'i de Acley, suppriori, in subsidium expen. suarum circa reparacionem domorum et murorum loci in quo fratres nostri inhabitant Oxon., ex precepto Prioris, 8li.

Exp. nec. In 8 quart. salis de Bayon empt. apud Nov. Castr., 46s. 8d. Item d'no Thome de Boynton, militi, pro medietate unius batelli per ipsum empt. pro le Fery apud Billyngham pro passagio ibidem, 26s. 8d. In expen. factis circa ordinacionem Nove Aule pro camera Prioris, ut patet per parcellas in papiro bursarii expressatas, 4li. 17s. 10d. In exp. d'ni Uthredi et sociorum suorum in Houdenschire visitand., 44s. 1d. ob. In exp. d'ni Joh'is de Beryngton a festo Sci. Hillarionis Abbatis, de Dunelm. usque London et Northampton pro centum libr. per Regem debitis adquirend., ac eciam pro collegio Oxon. per Ep'm fundando, et aliis negociis eccl'iam tangentibus expediendis, usque in vigiliam Nat. D'ni, per 9 septimanas, 9li. 18s. 2d. In uno pipe de Malvesin dat. d'no Archiep'o Cantuar. Cancellar. d'ni Regis pro amicicia sua nobis adquiranda in conformacione (sic) cartarum nostrarum, 7li. 6s. 8d. In duobus paribus caligarum dat. butelariis suis, 5s. D'no Thome de Newneham uni de duodecim Cancellar. Regis pro examinacione Cartar. nostrar., 40s. In donis dat. diversis ministris et clericis Theserarii, 6s. 8d. In exp. ejusdem pro negociis, videlicet pro Confirmacione Cartarum et pro Prioratu de Bristall, The alien Priory of Burstall, formerly in the parish of Skeffling, on the Humber, but the site has been carried away by the sea. usque festum Sci. Georgii Martiris per 14 septimanas, 10li. 7d. In scriptura et feodis de jure debitis pro sigillacione confirmacionum omnium terrarum et libertatum nostrarum, 13li. 8s. 10d. In expen. ejusdem d'ni Joh'is versus London. et ibidem per 3 septim. morantis, ac eciam pro expen. suis et d'ni Joh'is de Acley ad petend. licenciam a d'no Rege Ep'm eligendi, 105s. 10d. ob. In exp. ejusdem d'ni Joh'is de Acley, Joh'is de Beryngton, et Rob. de Pikton de Dunelm. post eleccionem usque London et ibidem morando per 12 dies, una cum Rogero de Caterygg, unde habuerunt 10 equos, 108s. In exp. ejusdem Joh'is de Beryngton post recessum dictorum d'ni Joh'is de Acley et Rob'i de Pikton ibidem morando per 14 septimanas et apud Scm. Albanum, Redyngs, et Chelmesford, 6li. 12s. 9d. In exp. ejusd. d'ni Joh'is de Beryngton misso cum d'no de Neuill ad loquend. cum Archiep'o Ebor. pro privilegiis d'no Priori per bullam a papa concessis, 27s. In sigillacione et scriptura duabus vicibus unius carte de Prioratu de Brustall, 49s. 4d.

Exp. min. Will'o Skynner de vico Sci. Egidii pro factura unius coopertorii de pell. lanutor. pro pistrina, una cum reparac. 3 cribrorum pro granario, 5s. 4d. In solucione facta custodi de Bonesfery pro fercula sibi debita in festis principalibus per annum a festo Pur. Anno d'ni etc., lxxviijo usque idem festum anno revoluto, 2s. In 4 libr. 3 quarterons de Chardecoyns, 5s. 6d. In pilulis, 20d. In di. libr. de Gira pigra, 12d. 2 libr. de viridi zinzibo', 6s. 8d., 1 cophino de Drage, 2s. empt. pro d'no Priore, 16s. 10d.
Repar. domor. In exp. factis circa facturam vie del Stottesyatt usque Bieurepayr per manus d'ni Rogeri de Aluerton, 4s.
Summa Exp., 1719li. 9s. 11d. ob.

Will'o Prentys pro factura 2 bronyngirnes, per Rogerum Couhird, 3s. Item uno homini auxilianti unum equum Bursarii apud Richemond pro le farssy, 13d. In girth∣bukels et bridelirnes empt., 3s. 2d. Elem. cons. In distrib. facta pro animabus d'nor. Will'i Balles, Joh'is de Castrobernardi, et Rogeri de Aluerton, 30s.

Pincerne d'ni Ducis ex curialitate, 6s. 8d. Item uni heremite apud Bieurepayr ad opus unius pontis, 2s. Servienti Will'i de Elmeden, 6d. It. Joh'i Momford ministrallo d'ni Regis ex dono apud Pittyngton, 6s. 8d.

Exp. necessarie. Item mulieribus suissientibus naperi Prioris et pro refectorio et pro 1 Surplicia Capelle Prioris, 3s. 10d. In sol. facta Henr. Fossour pro mundacione vivarii de Pittyngton ex convencione Prioris, 40s. In sol. facta Rogero Diker pro mundacione unius rivi circa campum de Pittyngton, videl't 240 rod. cap. pro rod 1d. ob., 40s. In expen. bursarii apud Stanhoppark causa recepcionis anima∣lium d'ni Ep'i nobis datorum, presentibus ibidem executor∣ibus d'ni Ep'i, cum multis aliis de patria, 21s. 4d. In sol. facta Henrico Plummer a festo Sci. Joh. Bapt. usque fest. Sci. Michaelis tunc prox. seq. pro cust. Aqueductus et plumbi de bracina ex convencione inter burs. et ipsum fac∣tam (sic), 20s. In sol. facta Hawmondo Pouchemaker pro pilacione lane 2 annorum, et pro ligatura aule nove nobis date de Ep'o, de bluett, et eciam pro ligatura magne aule d'ni Prioris, cum aliis diversis, 20s. In. sol. facta Rog'o Diker pro factura 480 rod circa le Bromsid, cap. pro rod 4d. ob., 10li. 17s. 6d. In sol. facta Comuniario pro cantaria d'ni de Neuill de anno infra nunc comp., 10li. In exp. Magistri Uthredi versus Lond. ad tractand. cum Ep'o et consilio suo pro Colleg. Oxon., 40s. In exp. ejusdem tempore visitacionis monasteriorum nostri ordinis cum fuerit d'ns Prior visitator constitutus in generali Capitulo apud Norhamton, 34s. ob.

Exp. min. In sol. facta uni pictori de Novo Castro pro pictura unius volucris Sci. Cuthberti pro exemplare pro le Rerdos, 12d. Raine, S.C., 119. In sol. facta quatuor hominibus de Schoresworth venientibus cum agnis decimalibus parochie de Norham usque Dunelm., 2s. In sol. facta Will'o Urde bercario causa quia stetit cum dictis Agnis per septimanam, quia infirmabantur, 2s.

In uno vestimento integro empt. per d'nm Joh'em de Beryngton apud Lond. pro ecclesia de Aluerton, 119s. 6d. In uno lecto de blwe empt. pro d'no Priore, 21s.; pro panno de Reynes empt. pro surnape pro tabul. d'ni Prioris et pro le deis refectorii, 49s. 4d.

Item uni de Cleueland deferenti poma d'no Priori, 6d. Item hominibus Prioris de Paslay in Scocia, 2s. Item ministrall' d'ni de Neuill apud Beaurepaire cum d'na de Lomly, 3s. 4d. Item in donis datis dicte d'ne et puellis suis in cultell. et serotecis ex precepto Prioris, 6s. Ep'o Elemos., 5s. Ministrallo d'ni Ducis cum uno saltante in camera d'ni Prioris, 6s. 8d. Uni deferenti carnes ferinas d'no Priori de d'no Ep'o, 3s. 4d. Uni portanti Heron∣sewes, 12d. 2 presbiteris de Hibernia, 2s. Item unum Maserre d'ni Regis ex dono d'ni Prioris, 6s. 8d. (Several minstrels, heralds, etc.).

Exp. nec. In exp. Mag'ri Uthredi versus Ebor. et Kawod pro negociis mon., 39s. 3d. ob. In 10 ollis cor. et 1 pare magne (sic) botellorum pro d'no Priore, 15s. Item Haumondo Pouchemaker et reparacione et unccione 2 barhidis longe carecte, 3s. 4d. In 8 qar salis empt. de ten. de Coupon, qar 4s. 6d., 32s. In 14 lib. de Saudore empt. lib. 3d. ob., 4s. 1d. In exp. factis circa furacionem animalium apud Richemond et Richemondschir, 36s. 8d. Item Gilberto Frethbanc de Richemond pro concordia facta inter ipsum et nos pro animalibus ibidem furatis, 40s. Item Will'o Blacden quia adjuvit apud Richemond pro predictis animalibus furatis ex convencione terrar., 20s.
Item uni homini ibidem causa quia arrestavit animalia predicta ibidem, 6s. 8d. In 24 quart. 7 bus. salis de Paytow empt. de Rob'to Oliver apud Nov. Castr. ad diversa precia, 104s. 2d.

Exp. min. Pro 2 Soudingirnes pro torticiis, 10d., et locione lichine 6d. In exp. Burs. apud Rongton West Rounton in Allertonshire. eo quod Rector infirmabatur, 2s. 9d. Item pro locione et Winding de Lichine empt., 10d.
Reparacio domorum. Rogero Diker pro factura fossati circa camp. de Pittington per temp. comp., 105s. 8d. Item eidem et Joh'i Broun pro factura stagni molendini de Pittington, 10s.

et Heghington, 10s. Item eidem pro reparacione fenestr. de Wyuestow, 10s. Item pro vitriacione fenestr. Capelle et Camere de Ketton, 6s. It. eid. pro factura fenestr. in Scaccario Burs., 6s. 8d. It. eid. pro reparacione fenestr. ap. Bieurepaire, 16d.

In lanceis et cap' (capitibus?) pro eisdem, 20s. In 2 duoden. Archuum empt., 22s. In Sagittis empt. 22s. 8d., 62s. 8d. In uno basinet et 1 brestplait, 43s. 4d. In 1 pauncs, 5s. Four small rolls, two of "Decasus Reddituum," one a synopsis of the Bursar's Roll, giving only the heads and sums, with an account of the receipts of Tho. de Lyth, Terrar, on the back, and the other an indented roll of receipts of T. de L., and arrears of his predecessors, Joh. Neuburn and Rob. Claxton, "et prefati Johannis," whose surname does not appear.

On the back is written,

"Ut ver dat florem, flos fructum, fructus hodorem, Sic studium morem, mos sensum, sensus honorem." Thus translated by the Rev. V. K. Cooper:—
"As spring gives flower, flower fruit, and fruit sweet savour,
So study tone, tone taste, and taste great favour."

Exp. Nec. et min. Et in Smygmate empto pro locione pannorum et le Napery d'ni Prioris infra tempus compoti, una cum empcione cirporum pro aula, camera, et capella d'ni Prioris, et pro refectorio, 14s. 9d. Et in 4or quart. salis grossi de Paytus, empt. de Willelmo Hedlam de N. C., 21s. Et in 5 quart. salis empt. de tenent. de Coupon hoc anno, 21s. Et 35 courtceldr. 6 bus. 2 pc salis empt. de eisdem tenentibus in firma salinarum et aliarum parcellarum ibidem, prec. singul. courtceldr. 4s., 7li. 3s. 4d. Et in 46 courtceldr. salis ad 4s. rec. de eisdem tenentibus ut de Arr. debit. de tempore d'ni Will'i Partrik ult. burs. et in usu domus hoc anno expend., 4li. 12s. Et Will'o Baynton de Billyngham pro cariagio salis superius empt. ac alterius salis, 8s. Et in 4xx 13 petr. cebi ad 12d. et 54or petr. flotagii coquine ad 10d. empt. de Celerario pro candelis albis, pro unccione ovium et carectarum infra temp. comp., 6li. 18s. Et in 108 uln. de Canvace empt. tam pro ligatura de lez Condetz apud Petynton et Dunelm. quam pro vestura de lez saylyerdez molendini ventritici de Fery, ad diversa precia, 32s. 9d. Et in 1 pare de Panyers empt. pro cariagio piscium a mari, una cum 7d. solut. pro 1 novo axe empt. apud Chestre per Joh'em Langley pro carecta sua, tempore antiqui axis deficientis, 17d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1420. A roll partly headless, mentioning Henry Helay as succeeding Will. Drax, and being the next preceding Bursar. Endorsed in an old hand, "Joh. Durham, 1419, 1420, 1421."
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. pr. Arr., 1490li. 8s. 8d. ob. qa.
cum Rem. et Arr., 2845li. 14s. 5d.

Garderoba. In 3 pannis et di. de grene Ray pro vestura capellanorum, clericorum, et generosorum; 7 pannis integris de lyghtgrene, et 7 pann. integr. de Violet Ray empt. pro vestura valect.; 1 pann. int. de lyghtgrene, 3 pann. int. de blonket Ray pro vestura Garcionum; di. pann. nigro pro vestura d'ni et confratrum suorum; 8 uln. de blewmedled empt. pro 2bus garniamentis duorum cleri∣corum de gradu generosorum; (in furruris, etc.).
Empc. vini. In 4or pipis vini rubii Vasconie, pr. pp. 100s., 20li., etc.
Dona et Exenn. Et Jho'i Ep'i "The Bishop's John"? Dunelm. portanti vesturam hiemalem pro 2bus Armigeris d'ni Prioris, 3s. 4d.
Exp. nec. Et in 1 sera, 1 pare de Gemowes, et in emendacione 1 sere, 1 crabbelok, 1 myour, et 2 drawtrapys empt. per Henricum Feryby, 3s.
Summa Exp. et lib., 1511li. 9s. 6d. ob. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. [fratris Joh'is Durh] Supplied from the next roll. am Junioris, 1420-21.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. pr. Arr., 1446li. 2s. 6d. ob. qa.
cum Arr., 2836li. 8s. 6d. ob.

Garderoba. Blod. et virid. pro vestura generosorum et clericorum ejusdem gradus; pann. ejusdem coloris pro vestura valect. et clericor. ejusdem status; blonket et lyght grene pro vestura legard. et garcionum d'ni erga Natale; pann. nigr. pro d'no Priori et certis commonachis suis. Et in 12 uln. de lyghtblew empt. de Joh'e Coke pro hujus∣modi vestura, pr. uln. 16d., 16s. Et in tinctura ejusdem in pannum viridem per Joh'em Pollard, uln. ad 2d., 2s.
Empcio vini. 8 pp. vin. Vascon. lib. Joh'i Holme butillario d'ni, pr. pip. 4li. 13s. 4d., 37li. 6s. 8d. (Total for wine, 60li. 13s. 2d. ob.).
Exp. Prioris. Et in corr. empt. pro 1 barehyde et 1 pare de besages inde faciend. pro d'no Priore, 8s. 8d.

Exp. nec. Et in Incausto empt., 6d. Et Joh'i Bekwyth pro irrotulacione placit. et pro diversis brevibus captis inter d'nm Ep'm et Rogerum Thornton cujusdam Inquisicionis de manerio de Folanceby ex mandato d'ni, 3s. 7d. Item in 2 Transumptis trium cartarum originalium Archiepiscoporum Ebor., 7s. 10d.
Exp. min. Et in Chiphis et gatis ligneis empt. de Joh'e Garton, pr. 2s. 2d. ob. Et duobus hominibus facientibus sepulcrum d'ni Thome Stapelay, 4d.
Suma Exp. et lib., 1513li. 6s. 8d.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1421-2.
DIV2.P: Recepte. Elvett in Dunelm. Et de 12li. rec. de molendino aquatico de Scaltok Scaltok mill is frequently mentioned, and is here shown to have been in Elvet. sic dimisso hoc anno Rogero Milner.

Houghall. Et de 8s. rec. de firma cujusdam parcelle terre ibidem vocate Ryage, The field adjoins the river, and is still so called, probably from Rivagium. sic dimisse hoc anno Rob'to Berall. Berehalgh, 1422 3.
Summa Rec. pr. Arr., 1558li. 13s. 8d. ob.
cum Arr., 2793li. 21d. ob. qa.
Garderoba. (Cloth as before, bought at Alverton, also as before). Blod. et rub. pro vestura garcionum; pro tinctura panni in rub. coloris' (sic).
Exp. nec. Et Thome Milner molendinario de Shin∣clyff pro molacione 10 quar. frumenti causa nimii undacionis Aque de Were, 20d.

Repar. domor. Et in reparacione super Trowez in pistrina, 22d. Et pro nova tectura plumb. super le Sowter∣lofte de 6 fother capient. pro fother 5s., 30s. Et Heliseo Harpour pro factura 1 mense pro camera d'ni Prioris, 22d. Et in 10 arboribus empt. de Abbate Novi Monasterii, 26s. 8d. Et pro factura del spone pro manerio de Mugles∣wyk, 5s. 3d. Et in 4 coddis de bras empt. pro molend. domus, 4s.
Summa omn. exp. et lib., 1527li. 14s. 2d.

cum Arr., 2726li. 10s. 9d. ob.
Garderoba. Et in 6 uln. de Bukkyshorngrene, pr. uln. 2s., 12s.
Empc. Avene. Et in 3 quart. 6 bus. de Coltehauer empt. de ten. de Byllingham, 7s. 6d.

Exp. Prioris. Et Thome Sadeler pro 5 novis Reynes de corr. pro stabulo d'ni Prioris, 3 Shakelys de correo, 2 heltres de corr., 1 nov. coler de corr., 1 pectoral., etc.; et pro factura 1 novi barehide pro d'no priore.

Exp. nec. Et in 1 vestimento dominicali empto per Joh'em Fyssheburn ad eccl. de Merington ex precepto d'ni Prioris, 14s. Et in incausto, pumysch, cera rubea empt., 2s. 4d. Et in di. reme paper empt., 3s. Et in solucione facta Ricardo Forster de Acley in prec. 4 quar. 2 bus. frumenti pro le metkorn, prec. quart. 5s., 21s. 3d.
Summa exp. et lib., 1343li. 3s. 1d. ob. q.

Garderoba. (Cloths mentioned are Blewraye, Blew∣meld, Greenraye, Reedmeld, Plonkettraye, Plonkett, niger, stragulatus, Ruset, Viridis, Lineus).
Exp. min. Et in cribris, Skeppez, Syffez, et 1 bus. empt., 7s. Et in 7 libr. et di. del Pakthrede empt. per Bursarium apud lez Shelez, pr. libr. 5d., 3s. 1d. ob.
Repar. domor. Super le Haybarn d'ni Prioris; super 2 tenem. in Newe Eluette; super lez Rynrofez inter aulam et cameram manerii de Pyttyngton et super cameram Senesc. ib'm, 47s. 3d.
Summa Exp. et lib., 1332li. 14s. 9d. ob.

Empc. vini. Et in 5 pip. vini rubii empt. de Henrico Thornton apud Novum Castrum, pr. 19li. 3s. 4d.
Marscalc. 1 par de Pulterpanyers; et in 11 duoden. de Candylweke, 11s. 6d.
Dona et exennia. Et in donis datis diversis servienti∣bus in die Carnipriii, et Cocis in festo Pasch., 4s. 4d. Et Ep'o Elemos., 4s.
Exp. min. Et in 1 pare de Crowets et 1 Tintinabulo empt. pro capella manerii de Wyuestowe, 12d. Et in 2 Kars empt. pro decimis congregandis de Wolueston et Nieutonbieulieu, 2s. ob.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1425-6. The heading is a beautiful specimen of penmanship.
DIV2.P: Recepta Shelez. Et de 3s. 4d. rec. pro tractatu de Sandeelez ibidem hoc anno.
Westraynton. 6s. 8d. rec. pro ladesilver ejusdem ville per annum et non plus, quia resid. ad firmam denar., et oner. superius inter redd. ass.
Summa Rec. (not cast up).

Repar. domor. Et in nova construccione orrii de Bieulieu, emendacione de le Bier, et aliis reparacionibus infra manerium ibidem, 25li. 18s. 8d. ob. In minutis reparac. infra Abbathiam Dunelm. viz. in solario caritatis, pistrina, et brasin., 6s. 3d.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1426-7.
DIV2.P: Receipts only; an unfinished roll.

DIV2.P: Recepta Skyrnyngham. Et de 77s. 10d. rec. de Joh'na filia Thome de Esshe pro lib. redd. ejusd. ville preter 12 lupos aquaticos et anguillas ut patet per rentall.

Ballium Dunelm. Et de 107s. 8d. rec. de redd. ass. septem ten. simul jacent. super Westrowe, et 3 ten. simul jacent. super Estrowe, et 2 ten. si. jac. super Estrowe, et 4 ten. si. jac. in Kyngesgate, et 1 ten. prope portam borialem. Et de 10s. rec. de molendino fullatico juxta
molendinum Aquaticum Abathie per temp. comp., et non plus, eo quod extra tenuram pro defectu tenentis, causa debilitatis ejusdem.
Summa Rec. preter Arr., 1545li. 13s. 7d. cum Arr., 2134li. 7s. 6d.
Garderoba. Ac pro 3 pannis et di. panni stragulati, le Chaumpe viridis coloris. Occurs repeatedly in this account.
Empcio vini. In 2 pipis vin. rub. empt. apud N. C. de Henrico Thorneton, 6li.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. fr. Will. Pertrik, 1427-8 (cum dupl.).
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. pr. Arr., 1438li. 13s. 6d. cum Arr., 1732li. 15s. 7d. ob.
Garderoba. Panni de blodeo et rubeo mixto, de viridi stragulato, etc.

Dona et exennia. Et in donis datis Archiep'o Ebor. ad installacionem suam in partem majoris summe, 40s. Et Willelmo cancellario pro contribucione facta ad facturam novarum portarum super utrumque pontem ville Dunelm., ex gratia tantum, 6s. 8d. Et in 11 duoden. cirotecarum, 16s. Et ep'o puerili de Elemosinaria ex mandato Prioris, 3s. 4d.
Exp. nec. Et Joh'i Nayler agitanti currum Prioris per 6 septimanas, 5s. 4d.

Repar. domor. Et in exp. factis infra duo stabula apud Bieulieu, viz., in hekes et Maunioriis et aliis necessariis, 13s. Et Will'o Kempe pro adquisicione et le Batiryng de 6 Ml Sclatestanes in quarera de Bieurepayr, pr. Ml 5s., 30s.
Summa Exp., 1491li. 16s. 6d. ob.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1428-9.
DIV2.P: Rec. pr. Arr., 1431li. 4s. 7d.
cum Arr., 1696li. 15s. 9d.
Empc. vini. De Henrico Thorneton 4 pip. pr. 12li.
Dona et exennia. Et Rob. Dalton coronatori Ep'i pro visu corporis Joh'is Nayler, mortui per infortunium, 6s. 8d.
Exp. nec. Et in cariag. 36 lad. ordei de Billyngham usque Dunelm. quia equi carectar. fuerunt accommodati Ep'o Dunelm. cum le Chariote, 3s.
Repar. domor. Et in tectura straminea super molendi∣num de Scaltok, 20s.
Summa Exp., 1266li. 5d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1432-3. A headless roll of this date; see below.

cum Arr., 2125li. 15s. 9d. qa.
Exp. nec. Et in 35 quart. 6 bus. 2 pc salis vocati Courtceldres empt. de tenentibus de Coupon in firma salinarum suarum ibidem sic inferius onerat., 7li. 3s. 4d.

Repar. domor. Et sol. diversis operariis laborantibus circa extraccionem antiqui meremii et imposicionem novi meremii, una cum purgacione (et) mundacione de le fleme retro molend. (apud Pittington), 18s. 11d. Operantibus super dolacionem, et novam posicionem molendini de Shelom, una cum factura de le forbay, 58s. 4d. (The "forbay" of mills is several times mentioned).

Condonat. et alloc. Et in denariis solutis Joh'i Gildforth pro le landmale 5 ten. in Pypewelgate a retro exist. de term. Martini Anno d'ni Mill'o ccccxxx et de terminis Pent. et Martini A.D. 1431, ac. de term. Pent. A.D. 1432, viz. pro duobus annis integris, ex mandato d'ni Prioris per annum 6s. cum 12d. pro secta Curie, 12s.
Summa exp., etc., 1591li. 17s. 6d. ob.

DIV2.HEAD: Doggetum d'ni Thome Laweson burs. Dunelm., 1433-4.

cum Arr., 2133li. 8s. 10d.
Garderoba. Cloths are Blewmellid, Grenemellid; (furs black, and white, as for some years).
Elem. cons. Et in distribucione facta pro anima d'ni Joh'is Fyschburne die sepulture sue, 10s.

Dona et exennia. [Friars minor and Carmelites of N. C., and friars of Hartlepool, each 3s. 4d.] Et Joh'i Mouton de Byllyngham, Nativo d'ni, cum infirmitate prostrato, ut in precio 1 quart. et di. ordii ad 6s. 8d. eidem annuatim per d'nm Priorem de elemosina concess., una cum 3s. annuatim solutis eidem ex elemosina predicta, 25s. Et in 8 dd. cerotecarum simplicium et in 4 dd. cerotec. duplicium dat. servientibus ad fest. Natal. D'ni, et aliis extraneis infra tempus Compoti, 28s.
Summa exp., etc., 1694li. 2s. 1d. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1434-5.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Arr., 1471li. 14s. 1d.
cum Arr., 1979li. 3d.

Garderoba. Pro 15 uln. panni albi empt. erga festum predictum (Natale D'ni), 13s. 9d. Et sol. Joh'i Pollerte, lister, et Thome listir, pro coloracione ejusdem panni 2s. 8d. Et sol. 15 fratribus et sororibus de Domo Dei, vilz. singulo eorum pro suo garniamento, 18d., 22s. 6d. Et sol. Joh. Colyer, Joh. Spurner, Joh. Turnbroch, et Warkmano coquine, vilz. cuilibet eorum pro garniamento suo, 18d., 6s.
Exp. nec. et min. Et in 35 quart. 6 bus. 2 pc salis vocati Courtceldr. emp. de tenentibus de Coupon pro firma salinarum suarum ibidem sic inferius onerat., 7li. 3s. 4d.
Summa Exp., etc., 1384li. 13s. 4d. ob. qa.

DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Arr., 1501li. 18s. 11d.
cum Arr., 2069li. 16s. 7d. ob.
Exp. Prioris. Et in confeccionibus et aliis speciebus empt. ad festum Sci. Nicholai, 4s. 10d.
Dona et exennia Prioris. Et quatuor ordinibus fratrum ville Novi Castri super Tynam, cuilibet eorum, 3s. 4d., 13s. 4d. Et fratribus ville de Hertilpole ex precepto d'ni Prioris, 3s. 4d.
Summa Exp. soluc. et alloc., 1427li. 19d. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1435. A roll so labelled, imperfect at both ends.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Arr., 581li. 10s. 10d.
cum Arr., 1139li. 19s. 7d.

Repar. domor. Et sol. Rob. Peirson et Joh'i Pixlay operantibus super mundacione de le fleme retro molend. per 7 dies inter se ad 4d., 2s. 4d. Et sol. Joh'i Wadley operanti super prostracionem meremii, dolacionem et culpacionem ejusdem pro molend. de Burdon ac operant. super refeccionem rotarum, facturam de le forbay, etc., 74s. Et sol. pro cariagio meremii a parco de Acley, una cum cariagio terre pro inclusione de le forbay per aquam ibidem asportate, etc., 59s. 8d. Et sol. Will'o Thorpe pro purgacione de le Goters circa manerium de Beaulieu pro evacuacione aque influentis ibidem tempore pluviali, 2s. Et sol. pro emendacione de le Cundet ac pro operacione super le Chartteloft, le Fermory, et in aliis locis oportunis ex mandato bursarii, 24s. Et sol. pro refeccione et emendacione ferramentorum molendini de Estraynton, 3s., factura unius nove rote interioris ibidem, et purgacione aqueductus retro molend., 10s. Et sol. carpentario operanti ad limitacionem d'ni Prioris et Bursarii per 22 sept. infra tempus comp. ad 2s., 44s. Et sol. Joh'i Pixlay de Fery ut pro reparacione tenure sue sibi per Terrarium concesse de term. Pent. et Martini Anno D'ni Mlcccc∣xxxijdo 3s. allocand., viz. de term. Pent. predicto, 18d.

cum Arr., 2141li. 18s. 10d. ob.
Garderoba. Considerable purchases "panni integri," "et in tonsione," "et pro coloracione diversorum pannorum."
Dona et exennia. Et in denar. solut. Joh'i Werk∣manno coquine, et Joh'i Spurner, fireman de Brewhous, pro eorum naprons erga festum natalis D'ni in regarda concessa, viz. alteri eorum 12d., 2s.
Summa omn. Exp., etc., 1684li. 4s. 7d. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1437-8.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Arr., 1438li. 8s. 2d. ob.
cum Arr., 2159li. 10d.
Garderoba. Et sol. Joh'i Colyer, Joh'i Spurner, Joh'i Turnbrogh, et Warkmanno Coquine, viz. cuilibet eorum 16d., 6s.

Empcio frumenti. This section, from having been entirely absent or represented only by two or three entries, has during this century mounted up so as to be one of the largest sections in the roll. This year the total cost of wheat is 263li. 7s. 9d. ob. The usual price per quarter is 13s. 4d.
Exp. d'ni Prioris. Et in 2 dd. zenzebr. emp. de Rob'to Marchell, Groser, de Lond., ad 14d. li., 28s. Et in 6 lb. Sinomomi emp. de eodem Roberto ad 2s. 4d., 14s.

Exp. in solaciis d'ni Prioris. Et in denariis lib. d'no Joh'i Oll, capellano d'ni Prioris, pro expensis ejusdem d'ni Prioris apud Buerepare a festo Sce. Marie Magdalene usque festum Sci. Bartholomei, ultra expens. per eundem Joh'em fact. in tribus ludis ejusdem d'ni Prioris, 16s. 9d.
Dona et exennia. 12 doz. pr. of gloves and 2 doz. knives; minstrels, servants, etc.
Summa omn. Exp., etc., 1920li. 8s. 3d. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: 1438-9. The Bursar's account was kept by the Cellarer and his colleague (conscius), and is printed above with the Cellarers' Rolls, vol. I, p. 62. It is the first of those which show a greatly reduced income and expenditure. Not half the rental is included in these reduced rolls, the rents not included having apparently been otherwise assigned, until 1446-7.
Comp. d'ni Joh'is Gatesheued, 1439-40 (cum ii dupl.).
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Arr., 484li. 2s. 4d. ob.
cum Arr., 868li. 5s. 9d. ob. qa.

Expens. d'ni Prioris. Et in 2 lb. confeccionum empt. de Joh'e Salton in adventu Ep'i Sarisberiensis, precium lb. 2s., 4s. Et in diversis speciebus empt. de eodem Joh'e per Thomam Warde pro chardecone d'ni Prioris, 3s. 6d.
Reparaciones. Et in denar. solut. pro Cma tignis emptis et liberatis Thome Bee, firmario manerii de Westowe, pro edificacione et conformacione unius bercarie antique infra le Hope ib'm, 6s.
Summa Exp., etc., 557li. 18s. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1439. A headless roll of about this date.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Arr., 787li. 12s. 11d.
cum Arr., 1219li. 2s. 1d. ob.
Garderoba. Et sol. pandoxatori pro garniamento suo hoc anno, 6s. 8d.
Summa omn. Exp., etc., 182li. 6s. 8d. ob. qa.
Arrears of 1439 are mentioned as coming into this account.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1440. Small fragment of a paper roll so labelled, con∣taining only part of the receipts.
c. 1440. A headless portion of a roll so labelled.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Arr., 481li. 14d.
cum Arr., 781li. 15s. 3d. qa.

Exp. nec. Et in denar. sol. Will'o Raper de Geligate pro 4 petr. ligature, 5s. 4d. Et in 14 uln. de Canvas emp. de Joh'e Plumer pro ligatura aqueductus de Beurepayre pr. uln. 2d. ob., 2s. 11d. Et in 37 agnis emp. pro expen. d'ni Prioris apud Beurepayre in ludo Pasch. hoc anno, 30s. Et in pergameno et papiro, viz. in 5 pellibus de velym, 2s. 6d., et in 12 pell. de mutylyn, 3s., et in 4or quaternis papiri, 20d. Et in 8 dd. de Candileweke emp. de Joh'e Raper de Thriske, pr. 1 dd. 15d., 10s. Et in 32 petr. de le flotage empt. de Celerario de Fynkall at aliis ad 8d., 20s. 8d. In 1 payr de Pyntracez, 12d. Et in emendacione dorsoriorum et aliorum pannorum in aula et capella d'ni Prioris, una cum 8d. sol. pro le cordys per Joh'em Dale, 2s. 4d. Et in expen. d'ni Prioris duabus vicibus equitantis versus Raby pro concordia inter Comitem Westmerland. et Comitem Sar. una cum donis datis ibidem, 33s. 4d. (Other expenses connected with this business). Et in 4 bancours cum 1 panno viridi empt. apud N. C. pro capella d'ni Prioris, 15s. 8d. Et in sol. facta Will'o Bakster pro
tinctura 1 panni pro dicta capella et 2 bancours pro camera dicti d'ni, 9s. 4d. Et in stipendio Ric'i Heworth carpen∣tarii operantis ad limitacionem d'ni Prioris et Bursarii per 57 septimanas infra tempus compoti ad 2s., 114s.
Summa Exp., 167li. 17s. 3d. ob. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. d'ni Joh'is Gatesheued, 1440-41 (cum dupl.).
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Arr., 457li. 12s. 9d. ob.
cum Arr., 846li. 4s. 10d.

Empcio vini. (Purchases made of Thomas Bee, John Hunter, Tho. Hedlam, Tho. Wardley, Tho. Hudson, Tho. Smyth, Will. Desburgh, Ric. Hall, all of Newcastle, 1 butt de malvasy empt. de Rob. Marshall de London, 6li. 13s. 4d. Total cost of wine, including carriage, 81li. 11s. 8d.)
Dona Prioris. Et sol. pro cirotechis fururatis, piliis rubeis, et bursis empt. et dat. diversis per d'nm Priorem, 30s. 8d. (friars, lawyers, minstrels, etc.).

Exp. nec. et min. Et sol. Joh'i Raper de Thirske pro 2 lb. ligature pro aqueductu de Beaurepayre, 2s. 4d. Et sol. Ade Haymond pro scribend. copiam Bulle de privileg. ecclesiarum nostrarum infra dioc. Ebor., 2s. Et solut. pro 1 sperver empt. apud London pro d'no Priore, cum cariagio ejusdem, 28s. 7d. Et pro 2 Rollez de Say pro camera Prioris, 16s. Et pro intinctione 1 eorum, 6d. Et pro suicione eorundem, reparacione et emendacione dorsoriorum et le qwisshyng Aule d'ni Prioris, 6s. 3d. Et pro emendacione 1 chafer pro hospicio d'ni Prioris, 14d. Et pro 1 duodena de Girthwebbes et 1 colthelter empt. de Joh'e Gervace, 18d. Et in 26 agnis empt. pro exp. d'ni Prioris apud Beaurepayre in ludo Pasche hoc anno, 27s. Mag'ri Will'i Ebchestre et Joh'is Gatesheued, Bursarii, versus Oxonias et generale capitulum, 8li. 19s. 11d.

Empcio vini. Et in 7 doliis vini rubei empt. de Thoma Hedlam The name of this merchant has appeared in several previous rolls. de Novo Castro ad 6li. 13s. 4d. pro d'no priore, 46li. 13s. 4d. Et in 1 Barell vini dulcis empt. de Thoma Hedlam, 15s. Et Joh'i Dowffe et sociis suis pro portacione doliorum ultra pontem de Tyne, 6s. 8d. Dona et exennia. Et in denariis solutis cuidam fratri predicanti in festo Sci. Cuthberti in Marcio, 20s. Et in denariis datis cantoribus ex curialitate ad festum Natalis D'ni, 20d.

hospicii ad 4s., 26s. Et sol. Joh'i Greveson pro 8 lb. de Rosyn, ac pro factura cere in 2 torches et in alias candelas minores, 2s. Et sol. pro 2 lepes empt. pro ustrina, 2s. 8d. Et sol. pro 6 paribus de Pyntrace ad 12d., 6s., et 10 paribus de Sydtrace ad 8d., 6s. 8d. empt. pro carect. Pro 1 magna corda empt. pro ustrina et pro le Spynnyng, 3d.

Reparaciones domorum. In lucracione lapid. et refec∣cione de le Peir juxta molendinum fullaticum Abbathie Dunelm. per 45 dies. Et sol. Ricardo Wright de Eluett pro reparacione et emendacione de le Waterwall ac rote exterioris molendini de Scaltoke, 15s. Et sol. Petro Waynman pro cariagio unius plaustrati de lyng pro obstupacione stagni molendini de Scaltoke, 8d. Et sol. Will'o Usworth, Waller, cum famulo suo, laborantibus super facturam muri ubi carbones ponuntur, 11s. 2d. Et sol. Ric'o Wryght de Eluett pro factura unius nove rote exterioris, cum emendacione de le faltrowe, et emendacione rote interioris de Shelom ex convencione secum facta in grosso, 16s. 8d.; pro nova construccione unius cot' in Shelom, etc.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1446-7 (cum dupl. mutil.).

cum Arr., 1394li. 8d. qa.

Dona et exennia. Et 4or ordinibus fratrum ville Nouicastri ac fratribus ville de Hertilpole, cuilibet eorum 3s. 4d., 6s. 8d. Et villanis de Stokton, Billingham, et Wolueston, 8s. 4d. Et in datis diversis operariis ibidem, 16d. Et d'no Thome Neuill, militi, pro relaxacione communis pasture sub sigillo Comitis Westmerlandie in quadam parcella terre de novo per d'nm Priorem in Spennyngmore subtus villas de Midmeryngton et West∣meryngton appruate et fossatis incluse, 66s. 8d. Et Joh'i Langton armigero deferenti literam d'ni Regis sub privato sigillo ejusdem pro mutuacione centum librarum ad excusandum nos penes eundem Regem, 20s. Et magistro Ricardo Wettwang et Will'mo Bispham jurisperitis et famulis eorundem cum cirothecis datis eisdem, 18s. 2d. Et tribus generosis d'ni Ep'i pro favoribus suis impendendis in negociis monasterii, cuilibet 6s. 8d., 20s. Et in Baptizacione filie Comitis Westmerlandie, viz. in 1 pecia cum cooperculo, prec. 66s. 8d. cum 66s. 8d. impositis in eadem pecia, ac Roberto Rukby portanti nova de ortu
ejusdem, 6s. 8d., una cum 6s. 8d. datis nutrici, 7li. 6s. 8d. Et Rectori de Riton et aliis testibus examinatis in eleccione Prioris, 2s. 3d. Et in datis famulis d'ni Ep'i apud Auklande in primo accessu Prioris ad d'nm Ep'm post eleccionem et confirmacionem ejusdem Prioris, 66s. 8d. Et Joh'i Stele pro emendacione horologii apud Beaulieu, 3s. 4d. Et clerico Joh'is Lematon portanti literam d'ni Regis Priori et capitulo prohibentem confirmaciones amodo concedendas, 3s. 4d. Et Edmundo nuncio comitis Sar. portanti literam pro promocione filii ejusdem comitis, 3s. 4d. Et M'ro Will'o Freston, procuratori nostro in curia Romana, ad assidue solicitand. et laborand. negocia monasterii, cum regardo dato famulis ejusdem, 23s. 4d. Et Joh'i Franke generoso, portanti literam d'ni Regis pro promocione magistri Will'i Freston, 6s. 8d. Et d'no Thome Neuyll ad manutenend. et protegend. nos et tenentes nostros, 66s. 8d. Et in donis datis ministrallis, nunciis d'norum portantibus ferinam et alia exennia, per manus Will'i Jarvaux, capellani, 56s. 3d.
Summa, 26li. 9s. 8d.
Expense Prioris. Et in denariis liberatis Joh'i Eden, capellano, pro expensis Joh'is Wessington protunc Prioris, viz. a festo Pent. usque diem resignacionis ejusdem, 5s. 3d.

Exp. nec. Et in expensis d'ni Joh'is Gatesheued, Terrarii, versus Houeden pro confirmacione d'ni Prioris, 6s. 8d. Et eidem Terrario pro expensis suis in Com. Ebor. ad communicand. cum d'no Ep'o pro resignacione d'ni Joh'nis Wessyngton tribus vicibus, 33s. 4d. Et mag'ro Ric'o Wetwang et Will'mo Bispham jurisperitis, tam pro expensis suis quam ex dono d'ni Prioris pro laboribus per eosdem impensis in eleccione ejusdem, 115s. Et Roberto Bartram, Notario, pro signacione 1 Instrumenti de resignacione d'ni Joh'is Wessington, nuper Prioris, 3s. 4d. Et Joh'i Berehalgh, Notario, pro signacione 1 provocacionis pro Suppriore et capitulo, Prioratu vacante, 2s. Et Roberto Bartram pro instrumento facto de eleccione Prioris et toto processu ejusdem, 26s. 8d. Et Joh'i Wynyarde versus Stamford et Oxon. ad citand. fratres ad comparend. in eleccione Prioris, 7s. 8d. Et Joh'i Schaldon pro expensis suis versus Coldingham, Insulam Sacram, et Farne, ad citand. fratres pro eadem eleccione, 2s. Et in denariis solutis pro pardonacione d'ni Regis, 26s. 8d. Et pro factura sigillorum d'ni Prioris, 26s. 8d.
Summa Exp., etc., 1257li. 13s. 9d. ob.

cum Arr., 1728li. 11s. 10d. qa.

Garderoba. In primis in 3 pannis integris blodei mellide emp. de Joh'ne Marchall de Ebor., tam pro vestura generosorum clericorum quam generosorum laicorum erga festum Natalis D'ni infra tempus compoti, pr. singuli panni 50s., 7li. 10s. Et in uno panno integro et di. panni stragulati cum 40 Rays emp. pro eiisdem erga idem festum, pr. panni 50s., 4li. 5s. Et in 6 pannis integris blodei mellide empt. erga idem festum tam pro vestura valectorum clericorum quam laicorum, prec. singuli panni 43s. 4d., 13li. Et in 6 pannis integris et di. panni stragulati cum 48 Rays empt. pro eiisdem, prec. panni 43s. 4d., 14li. 10s. (blod mellide for grooms; stragulat. for same). Et sol. pro le Sherynge dictorum pannorum, 24s. Et in 2 ulnis panni blodei de secta generosorum cum 25 Rays emp. pro toga Thome Marchall, Jurisperiti, hoc anno, 10s. Et in 6 ulnis panni nigri emp. pro d'no priore, prec. ulne 4s., 24s. Et in uno panno nigro integro et 3 uln. emp. pro Monachis Offic., 75s. (Carriage of cloth; furs for prior and official monks; 21 white furs for gentlemen). Et in 4 ulnis panni blodei de secta Gromorum emp. pro garniamento Joh'nis Proudeloke, 6s. 6d.
Summa, 60li. 21d.
Dona et exennia. (To friars, minstrels, bearers of venison, and of dolphins, to singers, etc.) Et in denariis datis Cocis ad Natale D'ni pro pictura diversorum ferculo∣rum, 12d.
Exp. nec. In cariando 500, 5xx, et 18 del Bidnel∣codlynge ab Insula Sacra usque Dunelm., 4s. 8d. Pro caragio 20 dogdravez, 400ma del Bidnelcodlynge ab eodem loco usque Dunelm., 5s. 8d.

Repar. domor. Et Rob'to Henryson, Joh'i Swaneston, et aliis, pro fodicione et factura 288 rod. fossarum apud Westmeryngton, unde 168 rod. ad 4d., et 120 rod. ad 3d., 4li. 17s. 8d. Et Rob'to Trotter pro secacione et le fellynge 92 fother del Ryesse et ramalium ad fossas predectas faciend., cap. pro singulo fother 1d., 7s. 8d. Et sol. pro cariagio 13 plaustrat. de Riesse usque dictum locum, unde 10 plaustrat. ad 6d. et 3 plaustrat. ad 3d., 6s. 9d. (more carriage). Et pro fissura et cariagio de lez stakez ad opus predictum ex convencione 4s. (more felling and carriage of
"Ryesse et ramalium infra claus. predict. crescencium"). Et pro factura 288 rod. sepium supra fossam predictam, ca. pro sing. tribus rodis 1d., 9s. 1d. (Extensive repairs and many things bought for mills). Et sol. Thome Porter pro le Baterynge 5 Ml tegularum, 2s. Et pro 90 petr. plumbi emp. pro magno plumbo voc. le Burueleade, de novo facto hoc anno, 40s. (More plumbers' work). Et operantibus ad molendinum de Acley in factura cujusdam magni muri densi et defensorii pro aqua ad idem molendi∣num includenda et conservanda, una cum mundacione fundi, et adquisicione lapidum muralium pro eodem, 79s. 4d. (Much thatching and slating, etc.).
Summa Exp., etc., 1213li. 2d.

Exp. nec. Et sol. pro 2 dd. di. cere emp. de Ric'o Moderby ad 5s., 12s. 6d. Et sol. pro 15 lb. de Rosyn emp. de Will'o Walker ad 1d. ob., 22d. ob. Et sol. Joh'i Greveson pro operacione dicte cere et rosyn in 3 torchez et in diversas parvas candelas, 3s. Et sol. pro 35 quart. 6 bus. 2 pc Courtladez salis emp. de tenent. de Coupon pro firma salinarum hoc anno ad 4s., 7li. 3s. 4d. Et sol. Will'o Gryffon pro 16 uln. de le Har, cum 6d. sol. pro 3 lb. del Har threde, 8s. Et sol. Joh'i Henryson de Billyngham pro factura unius stagni in Frognell ibidem, 16d. 1446-7). Et in 4 dd. di. et 3 Cuttez lichini empt. de Will'o Strike pro candelis inde fiendis, 5s. 10d. ob. Et sol. pro 35 quar. 6 bus. 2 pc Courtladez salis empt. de tenent. de Coupon pro firma salinarum hoc anno ad 4s., 7li. 3s. 4d.

Pensiones et stipendia. (The list is now headed by 40li. for the Prior and 40s. for the Sub-prior).
Summa Exp., etc., 1156li. 18s. 4d. qa.
At the end of this roll is

DIV2.HEAD: Status officii bursarii Dunelm. in vigilia Pent. Anno D'ni mill'imo ccccmolvijo per d'nm Joh'em Midellham dimissus et liberatus d'no Johanni Eden.
DIV2.P: Beurepaire. In primis in custodia Joh'is Robynson apud Beurepaire, 33 boves et 18 vacce. Item 64 multones.

Scaccarium Bursarii. Item sunt in scaccario 2 uln. panni linei vocati Flemyshclathe, cont. in latitudine 5 quart., prec. uln. 10d. Item 20 uln. panni linei vocati Holandclathe, prec. uln. 8d. Item 8 uln. et 1 quart. panni linei, prec. uln. 5d. Item 15 uln. pan. li., prec. uln. 4d. ob. Item 30 uln. et 3 quart. pan. li., prec. uln. 4d. Item 53 uln. del canvace, prec. uln. 3d. Item 4 lib. fili sacc. Item 1 mappa cont. 8 uln. et di. pro Senescallo ad Cur., cum 2 towels. Item 1 burdeclathe tweyld. Item 1 towel cont. 5 uln. et di. Item 1 mappa cum 1 manutergio continente in longitudine 2 uln. Item 1 salsarium. Item 1 par del balance. Item 2 verge ferr. Item 1 mensa. Item 1 cathedra. Item 3 pulvinaria, 2 formule. Item 1 pelvis de Auricalco. Item 1 forhamer. Item 2 ciste del Flawnders, cum alia cista. Item 1 par del bowges, 1 pore ferr., 1 candelabrum ferr. Item 7 tortesse pro mensa.

Parva domus subtus scaccarium. Item sunt ibidem 29 uln. panni sacc., prec. uln. 3d. Item 2 sacci novi, 1 par del pyntrace, 1 par del mydiltrace, 1 langrape. Item 1 malleus pro quarer. de ferro, 1 Gavelok ferr. Item 2 hakkez, 2 pykkez, 5 brochyngaxez pro saxis scindendis, 4 punchons ferr., 4 weggez ferr., 5 sarplez pro lana carianda. Item 1 brasynmorter. Item 1 dd. leys de lichino. Item 1 par del Weyscalez cum 1 balke ferr. et ponderibus plumbiis. 4or ciste, 3 Estlandburdez et 2 pypez pro rebus
conservandis. Item 12 petr. cebi facti in candelis. Item 1 somersadill bonum et novum. Item 8 petr. ferri Hispan. Item 4xx 16 petr. ferri de Werdale, 1 Crowpour, 1 rigwethy novum, 1 petr. del byndynge. Item 22 petr. ferri antiqui congregati. Item in le Woulhouse 1 par del Weyscalez cum 1 balke ferr.
Lardarium. Item in lardario 24 carcas. boum sals. Item 1 carcas. carnis bov. powdred. Item in le fyshouse, 20 dogdrawe, 12 stokfysh. Item 1 barell di. sagiminis.
Slawghterhowse. Item in le Slaughterhouse 6 boves depasti, 2 apri, et 8 porci.

Scaccarium Cellarii. Item in Scaccario Cellarii 3 lb. et 1 quartron croci, 5 dd. et 8 lib. piperis, 3 lb. di. del mace, 2 lb. et di. gariofil., 1 lb. sinamomi, 5 lb. del sawndrez, 1 dd. amigdal. Item 4 dd. del Ryss'. Item 1 frale racemorum magnorum et 1 frayle et 16 lb. ficuum. It. 10 lagene mellis. It. 24 quart. salis. It. 6 bus. lentium.
Stabulum Bursarii. Item sunt ibidem 2 equi ambu∣lantes et 1 equus trottans. Item 1 sella monachalis et 2 selle pro valectis, 4or frena, 1 tub pro avena imponenda, 3 horsecolers de corrio, 1 tribula.

Rem., Frumenti moliti et non moliti ac in pane, 433 quart.; Ordii, 68 quart.; bras. ordii non moliti, 620 quart.; bras. ordii moliti, 20 quart.; cerevisie This seems to mean malt that had been used in beer brewed. in solar' Read cellario? (sic) 26 quart. 6 bus. bras. avene molit., 4 quart.; bras. avene non molit., 54 quart.; avene pro prebenda, 120 quart.; pisarum et fabarum, 43 quart.
Item rem., de frumento ex provisione Magistri Will'i Ebchestre, nuper Prioris, 114 quart.

cum Arr., 2811li. 5s. 5d. qa.

Garderoba. Item computat in solucione facta Joh'i Marshall de Ebor., drapour, pro 2 pannis integris panni coloris et 16 ulnis de Redemeld empt. tam pro vestura generosorum clericorum quam laicorum erga festum Natalis
D'ni infra tempus compoti, prec. singuli panni 50s., 6li. 13s. 4d.
Dona et exennia. Et in donis datis uni famulo Thome Neuill, militis, portanti ferinam d'no Priori et confratribus, 4s.

Exp. d'ni Prioris. In diversis speciebus, 6s. 8d. 2 lb. et di. confeccionum, 4s. 8d. Annez, cum 3d. solut. pro liquiricia, 16d.; di. lib. zinzib. 11d.; d'no Priori pro cucullis, botis, tunicis, et aliis necessariis, 100s.; lotrici d'ni Prioris, 3s. 4d.

Repar. domor. Et sol. David Forster pro factura 3 copul. de sylez et posicione 1 friste in dictis domibus, 6s. 4d. Et sol. Roberto Tod pro opere carpentar. 1 grangie de 5 rowmez in tenura Joh'is Wermouth Jun. de Billyngham, ex convencione secum facta in grosso, 7s. Et sol. eidem Joh'i Wermouth pro factura murorum dicte grangie, 6s. 8d. Et sol. Will'o Wodrofe pro le watlynge et tectura ejusdem grangie ex convencione secum facta, in grosso, 8s. Pro factura 1 rowme in tenemento nuper in tenura Roberti Bercar in Wolueston, 18d. Pro emenda∣cione le horsmaunger in stabulo d'ni Prioris, etc., 8s. Et sol. eisdem operantibus apud le Warraunte Molendini Abbathie ac emendacione 1 le gutter subtus Infirmar. et emendacione alterius gutter in aula d'ni Prioris per 26 dies, cap. ut supra (12d.) 26s. Et sol. Will'o Plasterer pro le pargenynge aule Prioris ex convencione secum facta, in grosso, 10s. Et sol. Will'o Johnson et Rob'to Couper pro factura 1 rerdhouse in choro de Billyngham, una cum 2s. sol. Joh'i Loksmyth pro 4 par. del gemmys empt. pro ostiis dicti chori, 12s. 4d. Operant. circa le pergenynge chori de Billyngham et aule de Bieulieu, 8s. 9d.
Summa Exp., etc., 1215li. 10s. ob.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1458-9, cum dupl. A rough draught on paper; water-marks, the cross-keys, and a crown surmounted by a cross composed of three lozenges and a straight line.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Arr., 1330li. 18s. 11d.
cum Arr., 2890li. 4s. 5d. qa.
Dona et exennia. Et sol. Joh'i Porter pro expens. suis factis pro ferina adquirenda erga festum Natalis D'ni, 3s. 4d. Et in donis dat. Cocis ad festum Pasche ex precepto d'ni Prioris, 2s.

Exp. nec. Et in 50 petr. cebi, 45 petr. flotagii empt. de Cellerario pro candelis inde fiendis, unccione ovium, unccione rotarum carect. celerarii et aqueductus, prec. singule petre cebi 11d. et prec. singule petre flotagii 10d., 4li. 3s. 4d. Et in 7 lb. del rosell, 6d.; pro operacione cere et rosen in 2 lez torches et parvas candelas, 22d. Et sol. pro emendacione unius obbe pro vino d'ni Prioris, 7d.

Repar. domor. Et sol. pro opere carpentr. 7 copul. sylez pro 1 novo orreo in tenura Henrici Perte de Billyng∣ham ex conv. 8s. 4d.; pro factura murorum dicti orrei, una cum cariagio tocius luti et straminis ex convencione cum eis facta in grosso, 17s. Et pro le Watlyng et tectura dicti orrei ex convencione, 9s. Et sol. pro prostracione del Sparres et Watlez ac cariagio eorundem a parco de Bieulieu usque Billyngham pro dicto orreo, ac pro alio orrio in tenura vicarii ibidem, 11s. 8d.; pro prostracione 11 copul. de Sparres, 16d.; pro factura murorum magne grangie ibidem (Petyngton) viz. 12 rod. ad 4or uln. et di. in altitudine, capient. pro singul. rod. 7s. 4d., cum 18s. pro factura 3 Gavillez, ultra 4 uln. et di. ex convencione facta, in grosso, 109s. 8d. (A very long building account, amounting to 112li. 12s. 8d.).
Pensiones et Stipendia. Et sol. Mag'ro Will'o Ebchestre, nuper Priori, pro pensione sua, 40li.; Suppriori, 40s., etc.

Tallia et Indenture. Et in solucione facta d'no Will'o Hesilden Cellerario Dunelm. pro expens. coquine per tempus compoti, ut patet per Indenturam inter computantem et dictum Cellerarium factam et huic compoto annexam. No longer attached. 380li. 17s. 11d. ob.
Summa Exp., etc., 1289li. 17s. ob.

DIV2.HEAD: 1462? Two imperfect copies of a roll so labelled, containing nothing remarkable.
DIV2.P: (W. Ebchester, "nuper Prior," is still receiving his pension).

DIV2.HEAD: [Ex. Orig. Loc. 42].
Inventarium bonorum mobilium et immobilium Conventus Dunelm. A.D. 1464, in 1o Pauli 2di Pape, v. infra.
DIV2.P: [The first membrane of this roll has been lost, and the above heading is inserted in the margin, in the neat handwriting of Mr. Rud. The Roll has been similar to that of 1446 which is printed in Scriptores tres, p. cclxxxv, and only those portions which contain new matter of special interest are here given. It begins with Coquina, much as on p. cclxxxix of Scriptores tres. The manors of Pittington, Beaulieu and Ferry are let, so that there are no inventories of the Prior's goods under those heads. But under Beaurepaire we find, after the inventory of live stock, the following interesting Status].

Capella. In primis sunt in Capella duo panni pro Altari de panno lineo palliato, blodio intenso et remisso. Item Riddels ejusdem secte. Item iiijor pecie de blodio sago intenso et remisso pro Costeris pendentibus super muros Capelle. Item unus pannus blodii coloris ante altare super terram. Item unus pannus alius ibidem vetustate consumptus. Item j banqwer longum de panno laneo blodei coloris. Item unum pulvinar de blodeo sago. Item unum vas stanneum pro aqua benedicta. Item unum horologium fixum in pariete, cum duabus campanis, una majore et alia minore. Item duo candelabra de Auricalco. Item j Sconse de albo ferro. No sacred vessels, books or vestments are mentioned; these would probably be conveyed in the longa carecta when the Prior went to reside.

Camera exterior. In Camera exteriori sunt ij Canvacez, ij dormondez, iij bolstourz de plumis. Item Sylor pendens de blodeo sago, cum j Costere et iij Ridellez ejusdem secte. Item, viij pecie de blodio sago palliato pro ornatu murorum et fenestrarum. Item iij banqwerez de panno laneo blodeo et paliato. Item j banqwer pro sedili de panno laneo rubio, cum sertis et stellis glauci coloris insertis. Item j longum sedile, j Cathedra, j Cupburde. Item vj formule lignee, j parvum scabellum, j porr de ferro. Item j longa tabula mensalis cum ij trestellis. Item una vanga, ijo candelabra de auricalco, j candelabrum de ferro fixum in pariete.
Camera Interior. In primis una magna Archa cum ferro ligata. Item alia Archa minor, j longa cista ferro ligata, j antiqua cathedra, j formula juxta lectum in camera interiori.

Aula. In Aula j dorsale de blodio sago intenso et remisso. Item iij banqwers de panno laneo blodii coloris, j sylour de canvace. Item vj pulvinaria diversarum sectarum, j longum sedile ligneum. Item v tabule mensales, iiijor par de lez trystelez, iiij longe formule, iiijor scabella pro alta mensa, j porr de ferro, ij pelves de Auricalco, cum ij lavacris unius secte. Item j pelvis plana de Auricalco, cum uno lavacro.
Promptuarium. In promptuario sunt iiijor candelabra de Auricalco, cum j flore et cum duplici flore.

Coquina. In Coquina una magna olla erea in fornace, alia olla magna erea ex dono Willelmi Cowper, alia olla minor ex dono Thome Bawde. Item una olla erea minor de statu antiquo. Item j posnett cum Longstalke. Item due patelle minores. Item j mortariolum eneum cum pila ferrea, iij magna veruta. Item j parvum veru pro volatilibus. Item j vanga totaliter de ferro, I.e., a spade with an iron blade like a modern one, not one of wood shod with iron. j porr de ferro. Item j brandreth cum iiij costis. Item j craticula. Item j ladyll de Auricalco, j fleshcroke. Item j cobyren, j magnum mortariolum lapideum. Item ij dd. parapsidum stanneorum vas', ij dd. discorum, ij dd. acetabulorum. Item iiijor chargeours.

[The remainder of the roll is similar to that above mentioned, and, like it, has a notarial attestation, on the left of which is the notary's mark of R. Bartram; this mark is also placed across each seam where the membranes are sewn together. It should be mentioned that this is not a Bursar's Roll; nevertheless, it may very well come in here].

Rep. dom. Operanti super punctuacionem 3 rodarum super le Maltgarner et ustrinam abbathie ad 9d., 2s. 3d.; pro punctuacione 6 rodar. et di. super pistrinam abbathie ad 9d., 4s. 10d. ob.; operanti super super pandoxatorium et le Gylehouse, 3s. 8d.; pro punctuacione super stabulum hospitum et le Wellehouse infra abbathiam, 13s. 6d., operantibus super le riddyng et adquisicione de le Thyll in quarera abbathie ex altera parte Wire versus abbathiam, pro furno infra abbathiam, 17s.; pro superposicione unius molaris in molendino de Estraynton una cum 2s. solutis pro emundacione de le fleme et factura medietatis de le rynde ejusdem molendini, 4s. 6d.

cum Arr., 3544li. 7s. 9d.

Repar. Operant. super facturam unius Arche in introitu ustrine et emendacione muri furni ibidem per 38 dies et dimid. cap. per diem 12d. una cum 10d. pro extraccione et imposicione lez stapyls pro le Warehek molendini in tenura Joh'is Croke, 39s. 4d.; pro reparacione de le breyst ejusdem molendini (fullat. de Acley), 2s. 8d.; pro emunda∣cione et nova imposicione unius Cloure in molendino de Petyngton, 18d. Et sol. Joh'i Smyrk, latamo, pro emendacione diversorum defectuum in Cancello de Hesilden, cum nova operacione et posicione tabilstonys,
acheleys, et capestonys, tam in latere australi quam in latere boriali dicti cancelli, et factura unius Jambe in fenistra australi ibidem, 28s. 4d.
Summa Exp., etc., 1388li. 7d. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1467-9. Another headless roll of about the same date.
DIV2.P: Summa Within the capital S of this word are written the words "D'ne salvum fac Priorem et totum conventum." Rec. preter Arr., 1378li. 5s. 10d. ob.
cum Arr., 3601li. 12s. 7d. qa.

Exp. nec. Et sol. Joh'i Dande pro factura unius fusi ferrei pro molendino de Billyngham, una cum 13d. ob. sol. eidem pro 1 slot, 1 hespe, 2 stapul, et emendacione unius feterlok pro orrio decimali ibidem, 3s. 1d. ob.
Repar. domor. Operant. super emendacione diver∣sorum defectuum super le Avergarner abbathie, 2s. 9d.; pro factura unius fornacis subtus le Burulede infra pistrinam Abbathie, 2s. 6d.

(marginal note, "Istud esset insertum in stilo de expensis necessariis").
Summa omn. exp., etc., 1284li. 17s. 4d. ob. qa.

Exp. nec. Et sol. pro 1 Incude empto de Henrico Walkar pro fabrica Abbathie, 46s. 8d. Et sol. pro 1 par. del flekes empt. hoc anno et liberat. Will'o Falkar carectario, 5d. Et sol. pro 21 lb. del flokkes empt. pro le Bay molendini Abbathie, 20d.; pro emendacione 1 Ewer argent. 6d. Et sol. Joh'i Bromley, Potter, pro factura 4or Spultes eneis pro Aqueductu hoc anno, 16d.; pro emendacione unius fontis in orto curiali abbathie, 6s. 8d.; pro 3bus Weys salis empt. de M. Roberto Bartram and 20s.; cum 6s. sol. pro cariagio ejusd. salis, 66s.; circa inclu∣sionem de lez Stakgarthez de Billyngham, Wolueston, et Coupon, 5s. 6d.

Reparaciones. Et sol. Will'o Plomer pro factura unius gutter inter orrium fenile et le Avergarner per 2 dies ad 6d., cum 12d. solut. pro 6 lb. del Sowdour empt. pro eadem, 2s. Et sol. Thome Thomson, latamo, pro nova factura unius le Troughstane pro Aqueductu in gardino d'ni Prioris, 2s. 8d.; pro nova tectura unius parve domus supra fontem in orto Abbathie, 2s. 6d.
Summa Exp., etc., 1279li. 4s. 7d. ob.

cum Rem. et Arr., 3589li. 8s. 10d. qa.
Exp. d'ni Prioris. Et sol. pro 1 lb. del Annes et di. lb. licoricie, The same quantities of anise and liquorice have appeared yearly for some time. They were probably used for cough medicine. 6d.

Exp. nec. Et sol. Joh'i Watson, molendinario de Billyngham et Neuton pro factura del milniryns dictorum molendinorum ac 1 pedis enei, cum 3s. 1d. ob. pro evacuacione aque et reimposicione ejusdem tempore reparac. molendini de Billyngham, 12s. 7d.; pro factura 1 mylnstep pro molend. Abb., 2s. Et sol. pro le M'shellyng equorum d'ni Prioris, cum medicinis empt. pro eisdem hoc anno, 2s. 1d.; pro cariag. 2 Selefish usque Dunelm., 3s. 4d.; pro factura sepium circa inclusionem de lez Stakgarthez de Billyngham, Wolueston et Coupon hoc anno, 20d.

Reparaciones. Operantibus super novam facturam unius towell camini lapidei infra pistrinum abbathie, 17s.
9d.; pro punctuacione 6 rod. super cameram conventus apud Beaurepair et lentre ibidem, 4s. 6d., et 8 rod. et di. super le Haybarne et 6 rod. super le Havergarner, et 8 rod. super le Geststable infra Abbathiam ad 9d.; pro nova tectura 3 rod. et di. super unam domum de novo con∣structam infra pistrinum abbathie ad 4s. 6d., cum 2s. 6d. sol. pro punctuacione de le Salthouse ibidem, 18s.; operantibus in emendacione pavimenti subtus voltam porte occidentalis Abbathie, cum factura muri infra le Porterloge per 6 dies ad 8d., 4s.; pro le riddyng quarrere existentis juxta molend. de Acley pro recto cursu aque habendo, una cum extraccione et reimposicione aque ad stagnum dicti molendini ex convencione in grosso, 8s. Et sol. pro posicione del stakez et ryss et factura muri inter le fleme et molend. de Raynton, cum 3s. 4d. sol. pro emundacione de le fleme pro parte d'ni Prioris. 10s.
Summa Exp., etc., 1361li. 10s. 2d.

Operantibus in factura pavimenti in porta occidentali Abb'ie, 3s. 4d.; pro le laynge fusi et rynde molendini de Acley cum ferro et calebe emp. pro eisdem, ac cum 16d. solut. pro 2 hopis empt., 4s. 4d.
Summa Exp., etc., 1282li. 9s. 7d. ob.

Empc. Equor. Pro 1 equo empt. et liberato Nich'o Waynpan, 12s.

Exp. nec. Et in exp. Joh'is Ingowe et Nich'i Wayn∣pan laborancium usque Nov. Castr. et alibi in patria pro salmonibus emendis erga festa Natal. D'ni et Sci. Cuthberti hoc anno, 3s. 10d. Et pro 3 longe (sic) rapys,
vidz. pro carecta, ustrino, et fonte in claustro, 4s. 4d.; pro cribris, riddils, 4s. 6d., et duobus taratantaris novis, 3s. 4d. Et sol. pro di. rym et 3 quaternis papiri empt., 2s. 7d. Et sol. Joh'i Natres vigilanti et custodienti animalia in yeme in tempore nocturno, 4s. 6d.

Reparaciones. Will'o Plomer pro operacione in emendacione de le Wortlede et le Burulede Abbathie, cum 8 lb. sowdour empt. pro eisdem ad 2d., 4s. 8d.; diversis mulieribus pro portacione de le mosse ad stagnum molendini Abb'ie hoc anno, 8s. 2d.; operantibus in adquisicione et dolacione lez Achelers in quarrera de Hanyng pro Warranto molendini de Sheles, 13s. 9d. Et in factura dicti Warranti, 16s. 3d.; pro adquisicione et plantacione de le Whikwod super 120 rod. fossati circa campum de Wolueston ad 1d. ob., 17s. 6d.; pro le ridding et fillyng de le Bay molendini de Billyngham cum exclusione et reimposicione aque tempore nove facture de le Bay predict., 11s. 8d.
Summa omn. Exp., etc., 1290li. 3s. 7d. ob.

Exp. nec. In exp. Joh. Ingowe et Nich. Waynpan (ut supra), 6s. 6d. Et sol. pro exp. mag'ri Rob'ti Ebchestre procuratoris in capitulo generali apud Northamp∣ton, 40s. Et sol. pro exp. ejusdem in visitacione eccl. Cath. Wintoniensis, A council or synod was held at Winchester at this time under Bishop Waynflete. 20s. Et sol. pro reparac. sellarum Nich. Waynpan le Bagman et Joh'is Ingowe, cum 3s. solut. pro una nova sella liberata Nicholao Waynpan, 6s. 11d. Et sol. Will'o Hayn operanti apud le Hanyng super adquisicione et scapelyng 260 achelers pro muro molendini de Sheles ad 3d., 7s. 6d.

Reparaciones. Et sol. Thome Witwang, Shipwright, cum 2 famulis, operantibus circa reparacionem medietatis de le Ferybote de Billyngham hoc anno, cum seme, rove, clavis ferr. et lign., pice, et bitumine emp. pro eadem, 42s. 10d.
Summa omn. Exp., etc., 1279li. 3d. qa.

Reparaciones. Operantibus in factura de le Gavill domus molendini de Sheles, 12s.; servientibus (tribus) una cum extinccione et le drawkyng unius lymeklin et asportacione lapidum extra mare ad dictum molendinum, 18s.
Summa Exp., etc., 1193li. 5s. 6d. ob.

cum Arr., 3937li. 12s. 6d. ob. qa.

Thome Shawden pro nova factura 12 pedum et di. in magna fenestra aule d'ni Prioris ad 2d. Et sol. Thome Thomson, latamo, operanti in posicione unius Burulede in pandoxatorio per 1 diem, 6d.; pro nova tectura di. rod. super gradum scaccarii d'ni Prioris, 2s. 3d. Et sol. pro nova construccione unius Turris apud Shoreswod, a fundamentis constructi, cum omnimodis custibus et expen∣sis circa construccionem dicti turris factis et appositis ut patet per papirum computantis inde factum et examinatum ultra 66li. 13s. 4d. ex dono d'ni Prioris ac ultra 18li. ex donis confratrum Thome Holm, 40s., Rob'ti Werdale, 10li., Joh'is Danby, 6s. 8d., et Georgii Cornforth 10s., ac Ric'i Raket 100s., et Ed'i Bell, 40d., 46li. 6s. 5d.

de Will'o Lorymer, 12d. Et in 2 bult clothes, 10d., 1 stromill, 5d., 5 scepys, 5d., 2 lepes, 9d., 3 scutellis, 6d., 6 bolles, 6d., filo cilicino, 3d., empt. de Granatario hoc anno, 3s. 8d. Et sol. Roberto Derwent pro mundacione del keruyngknyves d'ni Prioris, 12d.

Operantibus in emendacione 1 gutter subterranei in orto abb'ie per 3 dies, 2s.; pro 1 plaustrato del Baststonys, una cum adquisicione et cariagio eorundem ac factura ferramentorum molendini de Billyngham, 2s. 10d.; pro emundacione del Frognelheued, At Billingham; frequently mentioned. 8d.; pro ferro, calebe, ac factura ferramentorum molendini de Sheles, 3s. 2d.; operantibus in dolacione de achlars et muracione murorum molendini de Sheles, 51s.; operanti∣bus in muracione murorum et posicione del Milnrasses et le bay ejusdem molendini, 17s. 6d.; pro adquisicione 100 achlars et 2 keylfulis lapidum, 12s. 6d.; pro factura 1 putei calcis, 16d.; pro combustione ejusdem putei, 8s. 4d.; pro cariagio 45 cimbarum sabuli ad 2d., 7s. 6d.; operantibus in le Riddyng fundi; pro cariagio 3 cimbarum lapidum a quarera del Hanyng usque idem molendinum, 10s.; 2000 tegularum ad idem opus, 26s. 8d. (Stakes and planting of hedges for enclosures). As frequently about this time.

cum Rem., etc., 3177li. 15s. 4d. ob. qa.

Exp. nec. Pro tractacione 40 travis (sic) del lyng∣thake, 20d.; 3s. solut. pro 1 longa reste empt. pro puteo carbonum. Et sol. pro 24 uln. del Flemyscloth ad 10d., 20s. Et sol. pro expensis factis messoribus et aliiis operantibus circa manuram de le Whynnyclose hoc anno, 22s. 8d. Et sol. pro trituracione 24 quart. et 2 bus. avenarum proveniencium de le Whynnyclose ad 2d., 3s. 11d. Et sol. pro ventulacione 24 quart. et 2 bus. dictorum granorum ad ob., 11d. ob.

Reparaciones. Et sol. Th. Shawden pro operacione 34 pedum diversarum fenestrarum vitrearum, viz. aule d'ni Prioris, Refectorii, Dormitorii, ad 2d., 5s. 8d. Et sol. eidem pro operacione 78 pedum diversarum fenestrarum vitr. viz. aule d'ni Prioris, capelle d'ni Prioris, Refectorii, Dormitorii, Chori de Pittyngton ad (illegible); operantibus in le Riddyng et le demmyng dicti stagni (abbathie) ac Ripe juxta le Scaltokmyln per 55 dies, 4li. 2s. 6d. Et sol. diversis mulieribus portantibus fimum, mosse, et piles ad dictum stagnum, 28s. Et sol. pro construccione medietatis cimbe communis passagii apud Billyngham, 102s. 4d.
Summa Exp., etc., 1579li. 8s. 6d. qa.

cum Rem., etc., 3071li. 9s. 10d. qa.
Garderoba. All the usual cloths and furs for the liveries bought of Ric. Clyff of Halifax, Draper, who receives for carriage from Halifax to Durham, 6s. 8d.

Exp. nec. Et sol. pro expens. d'nor. Rob'ti Wardall et Th. Pikryng equitancium ad d'nm Archiep'm Ebor. pro confirmacione eleccionis d'ni Prioris, 34s. 4d. Et sol. pro expens. Rob'ti Patonson equitantis usque Houedenshir et pro empcione avium ferarum erga installacionem d'ni Prioris, 4s. Et sol. Rob'to Derwent pro emundacione Corrected from "emendacione." de le kirvyngknyffez d'ni Prioris, 12d. Et sol. Th. Foreste pro le tuyng 3 pellium bovium (sic) in le lethir∣hungry, 4s. 6d. Et sol. pro 6 bultclothez, 2s. 4d., 3 cribris, 6d., 1 stromell, 6d., 2 skeppez, 3d., 7 lavyng bollez, 6d., 4 scutellis, 12d. empt. pro granatario, 5s. 1d.; 4s. solut. pro 1 longa resta (sic) empta pro puteo carbonum hoc anno, 32s. 2d. Et sol. pro 2 capillrapez empt. pro ligatura aqueductus Abbathie, 20s.
Summa Exp., etc., 1477li. 16s. 3d. qa.

cum Rem., etc., 2867li. 7d. ob. qa.
Garderoba. As in 1483-4.

Exp. nec. Et sol. pro ferrura boum apud Beaurpair et Acley, 17s. 10d. Et sol. Rob'to Derwent pro emendacione (sic) Read "emendacione." de lez kyrvyngknyffez d'ni Prioris, 12d. Et sol. pro 7 pollitridiis, 2s. 9d., 3 skeppez, 3d., 1 Reyng syff, 3d., 2 vassulis, 12d., 3 stowpez, 6d. ob., et emendacione cerarum, 3d., ut patet per billam Granatarii, 5s. ob.

Reparaciones. Et sol. Cristoforo More, Plumer, pro factura 14 rod. aqueductus abbathie hoc anno ad 18d., 21s. Et sol. Th. Falderley cum uno famulo pro factura unius Rayll circa unam clausuram voc. Halyfaxclose et emen∣dacione unius Payll apud Bieulieu, 3s. 11d. Et sol. eidem pro prostracione huss' pro lez Watils, ac pro le qwhykkyng circa clausur' de Beaurpairmore, 7s.
Summa Exp., etc., 1093li. 11s. 3d. ob.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1486-7.
